content:
Hi All, is there a open source github repo of .Net Client Test App that uses .Net API 1.x (preferably 1.7) to work with FHIR resources ? It will be very helpful if it has examples that subscribes to HL7v2 / FHIR events raised for Vitals, Imaging and Patient Admission. @Marten Smits , @Marco Visser - I would appreciate any pointers in that direction.
Thank you.

Ewout Kramer said:

Something like this: https://github.com/FirelyTeam/fhirstarters ?

Yes, but I heard yesterday that @Marten Smits is developing a new sample framework .. was wondering if it is using .Net API 1.7.0
I know Marten is working on a new FhirClient using a more recent .NET http client - but that's scheduled for 2.0
(in fact, he's just pushed a PR for it) https://github.com/FirelyTeam/fhir-net-api/pull/1364

Ewout Kramer said:

(in fact, he's just pushed a PR for it) https://github.com/FirelyTeam/fhir-net-api/pull/1364

Cool ! I hope it get merged today ? :wink:
Unlikely! It's a huge PR, both me and @Marco Visser need to review it - and because of the WGM connectathon going on, that's probably going to be next week.

Ewout Kramer said:

Unlikely! It's a huge PR, both me and Marco Visser need to review it - and because of the WGM connectathon going on, that's probably going to be next week.

Understood. Thank you. I will keep my eye open for the next week.
